product_name: Suunto Ambit2 GPS Multifunction Heart Rate Monitor
long_description: Explorers and athletes rejoice! The Suunto Ambit2 GPS multifunction heart rate monitor offers all kinds of useful features: navigation, weather, speed, heart rate, altitude and training data.
short_description: Explorers and athletes rejoice! The Suunto Ambit2 GPS multifunction heart rate monitor offers all kinds of useful features: navigation, weather, speed, heart rate, altitude and training data.
